events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because it doesn't meet my order specifications.
The issue has been classified as a refund request due to a customer receiving the incorrect item.
An agent from the billing and refunds team has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong item received.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I'll do my best to resolve this refund issue quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify and process your refund?
Here is my order number 123456789, and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect item that was delivered instead.
Thank you for the info. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3 to 5 business days.
Thanks for handling this so quickly. I appreciate the prompt resolution and look forward to receiving the refund.
The refund process has been completed, and you should see the amount reflected on your account soon.
Just following up to confirm you received the refund and if thereâ€™s anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, the refund has arrived. Everything is perfect now, thank you for your help!
The case has been formally closed after confirming the successful refund and customer satisfaction.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey regarding your support experience to help us improve.
